definition[0]: rigid methods, systems etc are very strict and difficult to change
example[0]: rigid and authoritarian methods of education
definition[1]: someone who behaves in a rigid way is very unwilling to change their ideas or behaviour
example[2]: She maintained rigid control over her emotional and sexual life.
definition[2]: stiff and not moving or bending
definition[3]: used to describe someone who cannot move, especially because they are very frightened, shocked, or angry
example[4]: I heard a noise and woke up rigid with terror.
